thread.title: RICHARD GONZALEZ
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by RICHARD GONZALEZ

author: RICHARD GONZALEZ
title: RICHARD GONZALEZ
text: My wife makes skin care products and she loves the beeswax. She melted it down and made mini hearts. She can then easily grab the amount to weigh to make her balms and salves. The honey in the wax keeps even when she's made her natural products. The aroma is rich and sweet. It's wonderful!
